mapper.select: SELECT Q.QUE_NO as queNo, Q.QUE_TITLE as queTitle, Q.QUE_TIME as queTime, Q.QUE_CONTENTS as queContents, Q.QUE_MEMBER_NO as memberNo, A.ANS_NO as ansNo, A.ANS_TIME as ansTime, A.ANS_CONTENTS as ansContents, Q.QUE_RESPONSE_YN as queResponseYn, M.MEMBER_NAME as memberName FROM (select question.*, row_number() over(order by QUE_NO desc) as num from question) Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON (A.ANS_QUE_NO = Q.QUE_NO) AND( Q.QUE_MEMBER_NO = A.ANS_MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.QUE_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO where member_no = #{memberNo} and num between #{startTotalBoard} and #{endTotalBoard} ORDER BY QUE_TIME DESC
select count(*) as TotalCount from Question
